shortdesc.ph: Registers an audio encoded frame observer.
Registers an audio encoded frame observer.
Registers the audio encoded frame observer.
Registers an audio encoded frame observer.

p.codeblock: public abstract int RegisterAudioEncodedFrameObserver(AudioEncodedFrameObserverConfig config, IAudioEncodedFrameObserver observer);

ul.li: Call this method after joining a channel.
Since this method and both set audio content and quality, it is not recommended to use this method together with . Otherwise, only the method called later takes effect.
Call this method after joining a channel.
Since this method and both set audio content and quality, it is not recommended to use this method together with . Otherwise, only the method called later will take effect.
Call this method after joining a channel.
Since this method and both configure audio content and quality, it is not recommended to use them together. Otherwise, only the one called later takes effect.
Call this method after joining a channel.
Since this method and both configure audio content and quality, it is not recommended to use them together. Otherwise, only the one called later takes effect.

section.title: Return Values
section.p: When the method call succeeds, there is no return value; when fails, the exception is thrown. You need to catch the exception and handle it accordingly. See [Error Codes](https://docs.agora.io/en/video-calling/troubleshooting/error-codes) for details and resolution suggestions.

ul.li: < 0: Failure. See [Error Codes](https://docs.agora.io/en/video-calling/troubleshooting/error-codes) for details and resolution suggestions.
